languages.text: "Тридцать семь процентов высшего конклава открыто поддерживали воззрения архимагоса Амарната и //исчезли//выведены из командной цепи// при засекреченных обстоятельствах. С тех пор кворум высшего конклава отсутствует".

"Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
languages.original_text: "Тридцать семь процентов высшего конклава открыто поддерживали воззрения архимагоса Амарната и //исчезли//выведены из командной цепи// при засекреченных обстоятельствах. С тех пор кворум высшего конклава отсутствует".

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of Supreme Conclave members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of Supreme Conclave members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「最高評議会メンバーの37％が公然と大賢人アマルナトの見解を支持しており、極秘扱いの状況下で//姿を消した//指揮系統から外された//。最高評議会はそれ以来ずっと定数に達していない」
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: 「最高評議会メンバーの37％が公然と大賢人アマルナトの見解を支持しており、極秘扱いの状況下で//姿を消した//指揮系統から外された//。最高評議会はそれ以来ずっと定数に達していない」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “最高密会百分之三十七的成员曾公开支持阿玛纳特大贤者的观点，随后便//消失了//从指挥链中遭到了移除//，具体情况为机密事项。在那之后，最高密会的成员之中再也没有出现过多数党派。”
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: “最高密会百分之三十七的成员曾公开支持阿玛纳特大贤者的观点，随后便//消失了//从指挥链中遭到了移除//，具体情况为机密事项。在那之后，最高密会的成员之中再也没有出现过多数党派。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Siebenunddreißig Prozent der Mitglieder des obersten Konklave unterstützten offen die Ansichten von Erzmagos Amarnat und //verschwanden//wurden aus der Befehlskette entfernt//. Die näheren Umstände unterliegen der Geheimhaltung. Seitdem gab es im obersten Konklave keine Abstimmung mehr."
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Siebenunddreißig Prozent der Mitglieder des obersten Konklave unterstützten offen die Ansichten von Erzmagos Amarnat und //verschwanden//wurden aus der Befehlskette entfernt//. Die näheren Umstände unterliegen der Geheimhaltung. Seitdem gab es im obersten Konklave keine Abstimmung mehr."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Trente-sept pour cent des membres du Conclave Suprême soutenaient ouvertement les théories de l'archimagos Amarnat et //ont disparu//ont été retirés de la chaîne de commandement// dans des circonstances tenues secrètes. Depuis lors, l'assemblée n'a plus jamais atteint le quorum nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: « Trente-sept pour cent des membres du Conclave Suprême soutenaient ouvertement les théories de l'archimagos Amarnat et //ont disparu//ont été retirés de la chaîne de commandement// dans des circonstances tenues secrètes. Depuis lors, l'assemblée n'a plus jamais atteint le quorum nécessaire. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «El treinta y siete por ciento de los miembros del Cónclave Supremo apoyaba abiertamente la ideología del archimagos Amarnat y //desapareció//fue retirado de la cadena de mando// en circunstancias que se declararon confidenciales. El Cónclave Supremo no ha celebrado un solo quórum desde entonces».
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: «El treinta y siete por ciento de los miembros del Cónclave Supremo apoyaba abiertamente la ideología del archimagos Amarnat y //desapareció//fue retirado de la cadena de mando// en circunstancias que se declararon confidenciales. El Cónclave Supremo no ha celebrado un solo quórum desde entonces».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Yüce Meclis mensuplarının yüzde otuz yedisi, Başmagos Amarnat'ın görüşlerini açık bir şekilde destekledi ve gizli tutulan birtakım süreçler sonucunda //yok oldular//emir komuta zincirinden çıkarıldılar//. Yüce Meclis'te o zamandan beri gerekli çoğunluk sağlanamadı."
languages.original_text: "Thirty-seven percent of the Supreme Conclave's members openly supported Archmagos Amarnat's views and //disappeared//were removed from the chain of command// under circumstances that were classified. The Supreme Conclave has not had a quorum ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Yüce Meclis'in üyelerinin yüzde otuz yedisi, Başmagos Amarnat'ın görüşlerini açık bir şekilde desteklediler ve gizli tutulan bazı süreçler sonucunda //yok oldular//emir komuta zincirinden çıkarıldılar//. Yüce Meclis'te o zamandan beri gerekli çoğunluk sağlanamadı."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
